attributes.background:
We urgently need Matt to return and consider running for PM.
Matt's humility, charisma, charm and integrity and the ability to take whatever is thrown at him, makes him the ideal candidate.
We have already seen the worst of him. It is time for him to show us the best!

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments. This includes calling for someone to be given a particular job, including Ministerial positions.

In any case, any decision to stand for the position of Leader of the Conservative Party is a personal matter for Matt Hancock, and any decision on whether to elect him as Leader is a matter for Conservative Party MPs and party members. This means neither the UK Government nor the House of Commons as a whole are directly responsible for the ask of this petition.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
